mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of Norfolk, Va. and vicinity
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bowman, Sam. W. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : col. ; 56 x 45 cm. on sheet 61 x 48 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Map covers the area from West Norfolk to Tanners Creek, and identifies property owned by the various land development companies in the area. [original]
Text in lower margin provides facts and statistics about Norfolk. [original]
"Myers & Co., Real Estate, Norfolk, Va." stamped in red in upper right of map, inside neatline. Some information has been added to the map in red ink. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect: some text has been lost at an old fold line. Linen-backed. Gift of James S. Easley. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Real estate development--Virginia--Norfolk--Maps
Norfolk (Va.)--Maps
